review_data.title: Super
review_data.content: Grosse Auswahl, gute Preise, freundliche Bedienung, angenehme Wartezeiten und das Essen schmeckt sehr gut.
Super nettes Personal und angenehme preise, die pizzen werden ordentlich belegt und sind super lecker.

review_data.title: Dinner with Friends after snowboard
review_data.content: We have been here with others friends after a day of snowboard. We ordered Pizzas and our friend, wich is lactose intolerant, could order Spaghetti with pesto Vegan. Really generous with the portions. Super quick service! Fine food and also our intolerant friend was happy....More

review_data.title: Eat and Drink
review_data.content: We was with friends in this small Pizzeria, and we taked 2 big Familys pizza in 6 person. The price was ok and also the pizza was good. I was very happy for my friends because its my favorit pizzeria per the fast dinner.

review_data.title: GOOD DRINK AND DESSERT
review_data.content: Any day It's a good day to go in FLYINGPIZZA, to drink a beer or eating one ICE CREAM. It's in any case the best choice to drink a BEER with the friends.

review_data.title: Pizza Bufala My Choise and Ben&Jerry's Cookie SandWich
review_data.content: The pizza with the Mozzarella di Bufola is always my choice in every pizzeria and here it is really good. Pizza ok and super fast service. Assortment of ice cream (Ben & Jerry's) infinite, with and without lactose.
